Why:
Developing low-cost nanotube sensors for monitoring fenceline VOC concentration 
characterizing indoor and outdoor PM levels using a network of sensors.

Generation of free-standing conducting nanofibers of PEDOT: PSS by electrospinning.
Optimization of RF-magnetron sputtering of ITO for flexible photo-voltaic application.
Built a new alkaline electrolyze system for hydrogen generation in laboratory confinement that is simple, efficient and safe.
